definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.chinese: 甚至连种族歧视现在也是自反性的。

sentences.english: A third study showed this effect was particularly apparent among more racially prejudiced students.
sentences.chinese: 另一项研究表明受种族歧视的学生这种表现更加明显。

sentences.english: Racist attitude had to be rubbished once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的态度必须根除。

sentences.english: L12) He was a victim of racial discrimination .
sentences.chinese: 他是种族歧视的牺牲者。

sentences.english: Racist remarks have nothing to do with the deleting his Hatsune Miku MAD.
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的评论和删除这个视频无关。

sentences.english: We're the only ones who can marginalise racist attackers.
sentences.chinese: 我们是唯一能让种族歧视边缘化的人。

sentences.english: Even racism is now reflexive.Consider the Balkans.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连种族歧视现在也是自反性的。

sentences.english: Court on the racial discrimination and injustice such as the Cameron stuck in throat.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上的种族歧视和不公令卡梅隆如鲠在喉。

sentences.english: Your also anti-discriminate and tribal grouping tribal group opposition?
sentences.chinese: 你也反对种族歧视及族群对立吗？

sentences.english: Now Ngobeni has accused the police of racism.
sentences.chinese: 现在他已以“种族歧视”为由起诉警方。

sentences.english: Racism has been a controversial issue in Spanish football.
sentences.chinese: 种族歧视在西班牙足球界一直是一个充满争议的话题。

sentences.english: Behavior that would fall under say, racism.
sentences.chinese: 那种比如说种族歧视的行为。

sentences.english: California’s constitution was only scrubbed of anti-Chinese discrimination in 1952.
sentences.chinese: 1952年，只有排华的种族歧视从加州宪法中删除。

sentences.english: The punishment for racial abuse is a five-match ban.
sentences.chinese: 对种族歧视者的惩罚是禁赛五场。

sentences.english: He went on record as opposing racial discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 他公开表示反对种族歧视。

definition: to feel animosity toward foreigners or outsiders/xenophobia
